  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseWrapper

      public DatabaseWrapper()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init()
      Initializes the database connection settings, creates connection pool, and sets up required database tables for quests and economy. Retrieves database connection settings directly from the plugin configuration.

    • initializeConnectionPool

      public static void initializeConnectionPool()
      Initializes the connection pool by creating database connections and adding them to the pool. This method attempts to create the maximum allowed number of connections. Any failed connection attempts will be logged.

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      Retrieves a database connection from the connection pool. This method acquires an available database connection from the pool, if present. If a connection is available, it is retrieved and logged as obtained from the pool. If no connection is immediately available, this method waits until one becomes available.
      Returns:
      A database connection object retrieved from the pool if available; otherwise, null.

    • releaseConnection

      public static void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
      Releases a database connection back to the connection pool for reusability. If the provided connection object is valid, it returns it to the connection pool for potential reuse by other parts of the application.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection object to be released. If null, no action is taken. If valid, it is returned to the connection pool for reuse.

    • closeConnections

      public static void closeConnections()
      Closes all the database connections currently present in the connection pool. It iterates through the connection pool, attempts to close each connection, and logs the outcome of the closure operation.

    • getQuest

      public static Quest getQuest(String name) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a Quest object from the database based on the provided ID. This method executes a database query to fetch quest details associated with the given ID. If found, it constructs and returns a Quest object encapsulating the retrieved data. If not found or if an error occurs during the database query, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the quest to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Quest object containing the details of the requested quest if found; otherwise, null.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createQuest

      public static boolean createQuest(Quest quest) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new Quest object into the quests database table. This method constructs an INSERT query and executes it to add a new Quest object into the 'quests' table of the connected database. It serializes the reward_item ItemStack to store it as a base64 encoded string in the database.
      Parameters:
      quest - The Quest object to be inserted into the database.
      Returns:
      True if the insertion is successful; otherwise, false.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided Quest object is null.
      IllegalStateException - If there's a SQL exception during the insertion process.
      SQLException

    • updateQuest

      public static boolean updateQuest(Quest quest) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing quest in the quests table.
      Parameters:
      quest - The modified Quest object to be updated in the database.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful; otherwise, false.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided Quest object is null.
      IllegalStateException - If there's a SQL exception during the update process.
      SQLException

    • deleteQuest

      public static boolean deleteQuest(String id) throws SQLException
      Deletes a quest entry from the 'quests' table based on the provided quest ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the quest to be deleted from the 'quests' table.
      Returns:
      True if the quest deletion is successful (at least one row affected); otherwise, false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the deletion process.

    • getQuests

      public static List<Quest> getQuests() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all quests available from the 'quests' table in the database. Executes an SQL SELECT query to obtain all quest IDs, then fetches each individual quest using the 'getQuest' method and constructs a list of Quest objects.
      Returns:
      A List containing all available quests from the 'quests' table; an empty list if no quests are found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the retrieval process.

    • getEconomy

      public static Economy getEconomy(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the economy details for the provided player from the 'economy' table in the database. Constructs an Economy object encapsulating the player's economy details if found.
      Parameters:
      player - The OfflinePlayer object for whom the economy details are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Economy object containing the economy details of the specified player if found; otherwise, null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the retrieval process.

    • disable

      public static void disable()
      Disables the database wrapper by closing all active connections. This method ensures the graceful shutdown of database connections when the plugin is disabled or needs to halt its database interaction. It's recommended to invoke this method during plugin shutdown or when the database interaction is no longer required to prevent resource leaks.
